website_summaries.verdict: The Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 IV offers serious video improvements over the RX100 III, but it is very expensive for a compact camera.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little camera - what more can I say?
customer_reviews.text: Only had this for a few weeks but all good so far. Pros: User interface is very intuitive - love it. Slightly better than my LX7 interface. Amazing low light performance - both video and photo. Nice compact size - although it does feel a bit too small at times - but I suspect I will get used to it. It fits in my trouser pocket - just about! Cons: Charger a bit naff - you have to charge the battery whilst in the camera. Seriously Sony?? Feels a bit too small for comfort sometimes - but I suspect this is just because I am used to the larger LX7.
customer_reviews.author: JLPicard

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Camera - Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I have had an old bulky digital SLR for some time. This is a fantastic replacement. Larger chip than other compacts giving best resolution and low noise in low light conditions. Very small, take it anywhere. Astonishing wide range of features. The drawback is the modest zoom range, but if you want a longer zoom range with this large size chip I think the camera size has to increase, so you just have to decide what's best for you. I bought it on a Sony cashback scheme and found it very difficult to get the cash out of Sony who were simply unhelpful, unlike Amazon who helped me get the cashback
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally recommended
customer_reviews.text: I have been using DSRL for years and I was looking for something small, that I could put in my pocket that had a similar quality than a high end DSRL. This is the camera. I had other similar compact cameras before, but this one provides amazing results, top optics, easy to use, good battery life and easy to connect to the smartphone to share the pictures. the app for the iPhone is not that nice though, but it does the job of copying the pictures. Totally recommended, and get a little grip as well and a FAST SD card if you want all the amazing video quality this camera can deliver. I wish Sony included a microphone input though.
customer_reviews.author: Pietro Zuco

customer_reviews.title: Even old people can use this.
customer_reviews.text: This camera's great. It fits in my pocket and takes great pictures. It has loads of functions I will probably never use, but that's because I'm old and what I lack in patience I make up for with money.
customer_reviews.author: Morpheus

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect, slight fault.
customer_reviews.text: Such an amazing, powerful, lovely camera. I get so many compliments on my high quality photos.. only complaint is the auto focus on the camera is funny. I find if I press the capture button to take a photo via timer setting, then move, it's almost never in focus. It seems the camera lacks the ability to refind focus once it is lost.. and sometimes getting focus at all does take awhile.. I try and combat this issue by just taking many many photos.. although I do get upset when what looks like a great photo is horribly out of focus. I tried using my phone as a remote to capture without moving.. but it never works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lacie D.

customer_reviews.title: Best I've owned.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a professional photographer by any means, but once you get the hang of using this camera you really can get some amazing pictures. Even though there is limited zoom, for the most part you can crop your photos and still have plenty of detail. Low light quality is outstanding due to the large sensor. Build quality is superb. Really love this and I use it at any opportunity I can. Thanks Sony!
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lens with overall great build quality
customer_reviews.text: Fast and sharp lens but would be nice if was a longer telephoto without losing the speed say a 105 or 120mm equivalent. Build is excellent but as ever it has Sony's strange interface where selecting one feature disables another useful function. Customization is good but again some functions disabled with some combinations. Noise is very good for a 1inch sensor and I have produced a good A3 print from the RAW file. Electronic viewfinder is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: D. B. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Always with me
customer_reviews.text: I don't like using phone cameras so bought this to have with me always. It is better than a phone camera but not as good as my D500 (of course). I have taken some good photos with it which process well in Lightroom and Photoshop. Battery life is terrible so buy and carry lots of spares.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great wee camera
customer_reviews.text: Great wee camera, feels solid. Had to buy hand grip though as body is smooth. Zoom average but this doesn't really matter as the quality of the images mean they can be cropped to suit. Usual problems with display screen in bright light but the view finder solves this issue when required .. apart from when taking selfies ... guessing created some hilarious results 😂 Battery life not a problem easily manages a full day shooting and more. Still got lots to learn but finding it quite intuitive.
customer_reviews.author: Avid reader

customer_reviews.title: The best small camera
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the original RX100, the RX100M3 and now the RX100M4 and while it’s expensive there really is no other small camera that comes close to pocketability and picture quality. Compared to the M3 the pictures seem sharper to my eyes and the higher resolution EVF is a great addition. If you have the money any of the RX100 line really are the best small cameras you can buy.
customer_reviews.author: nonsuchandy

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Cracking camera. Battery life is poor so get some extra ones. Sony operating menus can be somewhat difficult and convoluted to beginners but this does improve. Wish camera had a longer zoom but need to buy my view for that. Very pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: DrBob

customer_reviews.title: Great but extremely fragile.
customer_reviews.text: Great camera let down buy fragility. The top of the camera is extremely sensitive to the slightest knock - rendering the flash unusable as it cannot be raised. It’s a £200 repair. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Gadgethound

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic camera
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding performance,cannot believe the quality of the photos,Little on the expensive side but boy do you get back in output .highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: P. R. Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous camera, bags of features, image quality second to none - but small.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic camera and packed with features. I bought this for an upcoming trip to New Zealand. However, it is incredibly small and I found it impossible to work the controls. Check the sizing carefully before you buy! It is beautiful, but my mitts are just too big.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoniac

customer_reviews.title: The best compact money can buy
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic camera! Records in 4K, takes superb quality photos even in low light, all while weighing not very much! Have taken it to the US and several countries in Europe and it's allowed me to capture some great memories
customer_reviews.author: Moh

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great little camera. You need to get used a bit to using Sony though. But the image quality is amazing. And it’s comfortable to take to travels instead of my big bulky dslr.
customer_reviews.author: M1

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality is outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Its very early days, but the camera is proving to be a winner in all ways. Ease of use picture quality and good battery life, plus all the features of a far more expensive camera.
customer_reviews.author: T. Heyworth

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pocket camera with a good lens
customer_reviews.text: Good quality pictures in a pocket camera with 4k video and slow motion. Night vision photo tuned out to be great as it had much depth in the photo. I like the NFC as well as it is easy to connect to smartphones with nfc enabled. Also the intelligent mode is great which allows for burst imagse and selects the best image overall . Overall a very good model for the prize range.
customer_reviews.author: webbuyer

customer_reviews.title: If youre tired of lugging around a DSLR, get this.
customer_reviews.text: The RX100 is the greatest compact camera out there. Updated my original to this MK4. Still awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Snaggletooth

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the camera. It produce great quality photos. If I could wish for one thing in the next generation it would be a larger sensor.
customer_reviews.author: TomB

customer_reviews.title: Picture plus features
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera from Sony especially like slow motion feature on this camera and shutter speed.
customer_reviews.author: mr william poole

customer_reviews.title: Great pocket sized camera
customer_reviews.text: Wanted something compact for weekend beaks and hillwalking rather than lug my D7100 everywhere. Very happy with the quality of pictures and functions. Not SLR standard but still excellent.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Top camera excellent value
customer_reviews.text: What a brilliant little camera it does exactly what I wanted from a compact camera and more. Very very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Present
customer_reviews.text: Bought as present. Is liked by owner. So can't give much info
customer_reviews.author: John Pibworth

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera and seller speedy and straightforward
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera, had previous model and was happy with it. This model is better than previous one and am very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: lpc

customer_reviews.title: Zoom lens is small but you can’t have everything.  It’s the of the quality photos that count.
customer_reviews.text: I have used Sony cameras for a long time and once again this camera doesn’t disappoint me.
customer_reviews.author: B. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Quality Sony Product for a great price. Go buy
customer_reviews.text: Great Sony camera well worth the money. Wins hands down against my iPhone 11. It's like comparing Apples and Satsumas! Ps. ND filter a great addition.
customer_reviews.author: Adds

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera-- gets good quality pic w/out the need ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera-- gets good quality pic w/out the need to edit them.. Little expensive but looking at pic and quality- it's worth it
customer_reviews.author: vb

customer_reviews.title: Happy I bought it
customer_reviews.text: Amazing cam! I probably use 5% of what it can do - learning new things every day... Pictures are brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a Sony!
customer_reviews.text: You great what you pay for. Great camera and great pictures.
customer_reviews.author: TROOPER

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed the mark 2 for many years. The mark 4 is a step up! Great small camera.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding camera from sony
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant Camera Small but delivers brilliant images and video. Delighted with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: MR A F Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, fantastic pictures
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, good quality pictures and ease of use. Disappointing service regarding the cash back offer, still waiting for the promised £50
customer_reviews.author: toni compai

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera full of tech
customer_reviews.text: It would have been great of Sony to include a plastic handgrip to fit on the body but there are no extra items of much use.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Cosford

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but takes some time to learn how to get the best out of all the options
customer_reviews.author: PaulandSiti

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: In a word awesome. Does everything you could ever want from a camera and then some. Fits easily into your pocket but is very slippy in the hand. I recommend the Sony stick on grip which helps with this. Picture and video quality is outstanding even in low light. Its fast with nice sharp images. Finally I have something to replace my Nikon D700. Tip. By some spare batteries and a charger because the battery doesn’t last long if your using video, especially 4K. I paid £10 for 2 batteries and a charger which work better than the standard battery.
customer_reviews.author: Thor

customer_reviews.title: Very delightful and easy to use camera, and amazing service by AMAZON PrimeNow
customer_reviews.text: Very delightful and easy to use camera, the photos and videos are first class. This is my third Sony camera,, which I choose against the Panasonic LX100. They are both brilliant cameras, but the Sony for me tip the balance, because it is an all rounder. I would just like to take this opportunity to applauded Amazon’s customer service, it is unmatched my other companies. I returned my camera due to a defect, Amazon (PrimeNow) sent me a replacement straight away. WELL DONE AMAZON!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is not as good as I expected, overall it's small and compact, easy to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tiny Camera
customer_reviews.text: Camera is small and it's quite difficult to navigate. Picture is excellent, though my camera came with a scratched screen.. not happy.
customer_reviews.author: B.Valentine

customer_reviews.title: LX15 is much cheaper and has better lens. Anyway is a briliant compact camera
customer_reviews.text: A bit expensive. I have now Panasonic LX15 . LX15 is much cheaper and has better lens. Anyway is a briliant compact camera.
customer_reviews.author: Marcin

customer_reviews.title: Incredible pocket rocket
customer_reviews.text: I tried to buy this camera from Amazon and failed miserably so got is elsewhere and what a cracker it is. The video and stabilisation are simply incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Serious Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: just a (expensive) camera, not easy to make the best out of it
customer_reviews.text: I still need to find out why I bought this instead of using my pixel phone for pictures...
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good camera, crap employees
customer_reviews.text: Camera's OK but the cashback thing is proving quite difficult to obtain. I sent Sony a copy of the invoice and filled in the on-line form stating that I bought the camera on 30 November. Sony have rejected my claim because the dates don't match. I've pointed out that the invoice shows that I placed my order on 30 November and that the invoice is dated 1 December which is the date it was issued. I'm not sure what Sony expect me to do. I don't issue the invoices myself. I'm far to busy to be wasting time on this so the camera's going back and I'm getting a lovely Leica Q. Good camera, crap employees.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a waste of time and I needed it for the holiday ...
customer_reviews.text: The box says RX100M4, but inside is the first edition RX100!!! What a waste of time and I needed it for the holiday starting today! Should have stuck to PC world!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sony DSCRX100M4 Review
customer_reviews.text: This camera is simply fantastic! I really like how clear everything is, and the extreme resolutions it can reach. Nice and small too. Highly recommend if you have the money :)
customer_reviews.author: Andy Moshi
